context: As part of a sign-in attempt using a deceptive user account detected on the host `vnevado-win10b` with IP address `141.216.110.153`, attackers might be using the account to perform various attack activities, including lateral movement and accessing sensitive data. Additionally, a known credential theft tool execution was detected shortly after.
question: In relation to the detected malicious credential theft tool execution, what is the IP address associated with this activity?
solution_steps: A sign-in attempt was detected using a deceptive user account `kyleg` on host `vnevado-win10v`.
Malicious credential theft tool execution was detected coming from IP address `65.233.23.156`.
